name: Kristen Patton
text: They have quick delivery time. Very good pizza but a little pricey most of the time. There pizza is always better when you eat inside rather than getting it delivered. Sometimes there pyzones are pretty empty with barely anything inside but I do recommend their pan, and stuffed crushed pizza !

name: Gloria Moon
text: Took almost 45 minutes to get my food AFTER it left the store. Barley warm. Pricey but tasted cheap. Will not be back.

name: Metal Detecting with Randy
text:
The place has really gone downhill in the past 2 years.

text: Our visit on Wednesday was on point....our waitress did her job to 100% satisfaction....she smiled....delivered....and followed up exactly as pizza hut would have wanted...with sooo many competitors service is the defining difference. Its …More

text: Prices are too high, quality of the food is subpar at best... Every time we order our pan pizza is never done, the dough os nearly raw in center of pizza... Never get the extra sauce we request, and they wreck havoc on your wallet if you …More

name: Jamie Smith
text: Decided to go to pizza hut yesterday evening for a last minute Birthday dinner. We were hungry and exhausted from a busy day. Wasn't overly crowded! Was seated right away and drink orders were taken. It was mentioned that two people had …More

name: Chris Hoover
text: This is first in about 12-15 years we stopped at Pizza hut. Very good, better than I remembered. No more greasy crust. Great discount too.

name: Amy Saathoff
text: Food was very good. Served fairly quickly. Waitress was nice but seemed more concerned with talking behind the counter to coworkers about her life problems. We've all been there...I know... but keep in mind you have customers that can hear everything your loud mouth is saying!!!
